Posts.EditableText:
Hey all,

I am having a lot of problems uploading my Quest file right now.

The game is already published, but I made some changes, so I have the updated quest file to upload. It works great it Quest with no errors. I have been updating this game the last couple weeks with no problems.

Suddenly, no matter how I try to upload it, it's giving me the error; "The resource you are looking for has been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable." once the upload completes.

I tried to make a new/different account, but that is giving me the exact same problem.

Does anyone know what's going on here?

Here is the game; http://textadventures.co.uk/games/play/ea87r7nej0u5ozopoanyuq

I have been working on this for weeks and only have 4 hours before I need to be on a plane with this accessory/game/app to a convention in Vegas. I thought I'd upload my final changes and this sudden error is giving me a lot of problems, so any help is appreciated.
